given.text: I have always appreciated not only Michael's technical skill, but also his willingness to find a solution to my various (and sometimes confusing) technology issues.
Michael is easy to work with and always works until the problem is taken care of. Michael thinks critically while also adding other viewpoints into his solutions. I highly recommend Michael-

I can recommend Michael as a person who has good creative instincts with strong technical ability and excellent communication skills. In working with Michael on projects, I found that he was a very detail oriented software engineer, capable of adapting to new working environments and unafraid to try new things. He has a willingness to learn when it comes to professional development, and his personality added great morale to the team.
…
See more
I worked with Michael Painter in the Marketing Department at Pre-Employ.com and found him to be a knowledgeable, talented, and hard working colleague with a wide assortment of programming skills.

I worked with Michael in relation to the website at Simpson University. He was thorough in his work. He was able to take direction well, but was not afraid to counter with ideas and/or suggestions that in many cases, turned out to be superior to what was requested. He's a confident worker, extremely patient, and well thought of. Strong character, and a fantastic work ethic were evident. I have no qualms in recommending him for any position.

Mike has the rare combination of technical understanding and a keen design sense – great mix. His understanding of the bigger picture from the perspective of the end user makes his insight very valuable. Working for Mike was very rewarding. Not only did he manage me well but he continually facilitated my professional growth and development. -Akshay

received.text: Matt is the epitome of grace under pressure. While working at pre-employ.com he was asked to do a lot with a little and managed to keep a busy fast paced environment from turning into chaos. His management skills are fantastic and he knows how to utilize his resources efficiently.
Donato is an experienced and mature programmer with keen insight into development best practices and problem solving skills.
